headline: Crypto stock emerges as rare winner amid market crash
summary: As global crypto markets reeled from one of the sharpest sell-offs in years, a handful of crypto stocks managed to stay in the green on Oct. 10 led by Eightco Holdings (NASDAQ: ORBS), which surged 16.6% even as Bitcoin and Ethereum sank double digits.
